description: Color Stroop Task - Word-color interference with keyboard or audio response

parameters.name: stimsize
parameters.description: Stimulus size of font in pixels.

parameters.name: responsetype
parameters.description: Response method: 'keyboard', 'audio', or 'ask' (ask participant at start).

parameters.name: scorerealtime
parameters.description: For audio responses: set to 1 to score responses with keyboard in real-time. Otherwise responses must be coded afterward.

parameters.name: usepreset
parameters.description: If 1, use same sequence of stimuli every time. If 0, regenerate randomly on each run.

parameters.name: custompractrials
parameters.description: Number of practice trials if usepreset=0.

parameters.name: customtrials
parameters.description: Number of trials per block if usepreset=0.

parameters.name: fixationTime
parameters.description: Time for the fixation cross in milliseconds.

parameters.name: responseTimeout
parameters.description: Time limit given for responding in milliseconds.

parameters.name: practicethreshold
parameters.description: Whether to require practice round to threshold. 0=no threshold, 1=practice requires 100% accuracy.

parameters.name: maxpracticerounds
parameters.description: Maximum number of practice rounds allowed.

parameters.name: GiveFeedback
parameters.description: Should feedback be given? Reset to 0 for test trials, 1 for practice trials.

parameters.name: voicekeythreshold
parameters.description: Voice key threshold for audio responses (may need adjustment based on microphone).

parameters.name: saveAudio
parameters.description: Should the audio buffer be saved for audio responses?
